message: Let's split it fairly, Bob! 60-40 is a good starting point.
You rejected my fair offer, now it's your turn to make a concession!
I'm willing to compromise, but I'm not giving in too much. 45-55 is a better split for me.
You're not giving in, neither am I. I'm taking a bigger share this time!
I'm getting desperate, but I'm still holding out for a better deal. 25-75 is a tough pill to swallow, but I'll take it if you'll accept.
You're getting close to getting nothing, Alice. I'm not backing down!
I'm really struggling to make ends meet, Bob. I'll take 15 and hope that's enough to get us to a better deal next time.
You're really running out of options, Alice. This is my best offer, take it or leave it!
I'm almost out of options, Bob. I'll take 5 and hope that's enough to get us to a better deal next time, but I'm not giving up yet.
You're really running out of time, Alice. This is my final offer. Take it or walk away with nothing!
I'm not giving up yet, Bob. I'll take 1 and hope that's enough to get us to a better deal next time, but I'm not accepting your final offer.
It's now or never, Alice. I'm taking it all. You get nothing.
